item.title: Selected curriculum vitæ
item.description: Positions in Medical Education 2017Assistant Professor of Medicine 2017Associate Fellowship Program Director 2017Course Director, Fellows Immunology Course 2016–20172016-2017 Chief Fellow Curriculum Development 2017Fellows Immunology Course 2017M3 Immunology Online Module 2013–2015Medical Education Track for Internal Medicine Residency Program at Icahn School of Medicine at Mount Sinai, Co-founder Co-developed curriculum outline and assessment methods Facilitated implementation of pilot track year 2010MSTP Back-to-M3 Student Transition Course
